howItWork.title: How I Approach Problems
howItWork.subtitle: Not through technology for technology's sake—but through business-first, human-centered innovation
howItWork.resultTagline: Result: Solutions that work for business, teams, and users

1.title: Business Outcomes First
1.desc: I start with: "What business problem are we solving?" Not: "What technology should we use?"
1.example: Delivery Hero needed revenue growth → Display Ads platform → 20% revenue increase

2.title: Out-of-Box Thinking
2.desc: I challenge assumptions and find creative solutions others miss. Innovation over convention.
2.example: BRITA: Prototyped AI-driven search optimization to future-proof for Google AI results

3.title: Empathetic Leadership
3.desc: I lead by enabling others, not commanding. Collaboration and empathy over hierarchy.
3.example: PACT: Aligned 100+ competing companies through facilitation, not force

4.title: Hands-On Execution
4.desc: I don't just advise—I architect, code, and deploy. From design to production.
4.example: SINE: Designed AND implemented PACT Catalog (Next.js, React, Java Spring Boot)

about.title: Prasad Tilloo
about.description: 15+ years delivering transformational outcomes across Cloud Modernization, Legacy System Migration, and AI/ML Infrastructure for Fortune 100 clients.

philosophy.title: My Leadership Philosophy
philosophy.quote: The best solutions come from understanding both the business problem AND the people solving it.

outcomes.title: Business Outcomes Over Technical Elegance
outcomes.desc: I measure success by business impact, not technical complexity. A simple solution that drives revenue beats an elegant one that doesn't.

innovation.title: Innovation Through Creative Problem-Solving
innovation.desc: I challenge assumptions and think outside the box. When everyone says 'it can't be done,' I ask 'why not?'

leadership.title: Servant Leadership & Empathy
leadership.desc: I lead by enabling others, not commanding them. My role is to remove obstacles, provide context, and empower teams.

execution.title: Hands-On Execution
execution.desc: I don't just strategize—I execute. I write code, design architectures, and deploy to production.

proof.title: The Architect's Proof
proof.p1: I don't just design systems; I ensure their survival and scale in the real world.
proof.p2: My career has been defined by complex transformations—from migrating legacy code to architecting global standards.
proof.quote: Prasad combines deep technical expertise with a rare ability to explain complex architectures to C-level stakeholders.

consulting.title: Tier-1 Consulting Pedigree
consulting.desc: Spent 5+ years leading high-stakes digital transformation initiatives.

brita.challenge: 6 EMEA markets running on outdated Shopware. Needed to modernize to Shopify Plus without disrupting €XX million in annual e-commerce revenue.

sine.role: Senior Technical Project Manager / Lead Architect
sine.challenge: Scope 3 emissions tracking was impossible due to data silos. Need a global standard for carbon data exchange.
deliverables: Defined global Tech Specification for Product Carbon Footprint with Microsoft, SAP, Siemens
Built PACT Online Catalog cloud marketplace from scratch
Led WBCSD PACT Standard adoption with 20+ Fortune 100 firms

deliveryHero.challenge: Ad server latency costing revenue during peak hours. Need to scale to 5M+ daily transactions.
deliverables: Re-architected to Go + Redis for <20ms latency
Implemented per-second billing and exact-once processing
Led 10-member cross-functional team (iOS, Android, Golang)

boehringer.challenge: R&D data silos slowing drug discovery. Need GDPR-compliant Data Mesh.
deliverables: Built Enterprise Data Lake accelerating AI/ML insights by 50%
Established governance framework satisfying German Works Council
Automated PII masking and access controls

pwc.challenge: Healthcare clients facing compliance audits and legacy system EOL.
deliverables: Led $650K cloud modernization program for e-commerce and healthcare systems
Designed pharmacy module boosting mobile app traffic by 70%
Co-developed cloud-based Enterprise Data Lake and domain-driven microservices

challenge.title: The Scope 3 Data Problem
challenge.desc: 90% of a company's carbon footprint lies in its supply chain (Scope 3). Yet, most companies rely on vague industry averages because they cannot get <0>primary data</0> from their thousands of suppliers.
points: Data silos across incompatible ERP systems
Security concerns sharing sensitive supplier data

hero.title:
Stuck in <0>HIPAA Compliance Hell</0>
During Cloud Migration?
hero.subtitle: I've successfully migrated <0>12 healthcare systems</0> to AWS without a single <1>HIPAA violation</1>, <2>data breach</2>, or <3>downtime incident</3>.

problems.title: Sound Familiar?
problems.subtitle: These are the top 3 challenges healthcare organizations face during cloud migration.

item1.title: We Keep Failing HIPAA Audits
item1.desc: Your on-premise system can't meet modern compliance requirements.
item1.impact: Every audit is a gamble that could cost you €50K+ in findings.

item2.title: Cloud Migration Seems Too Risky
item2.desc: You've tried twice. Both times stopped due to data breach concerns.
item2.impact: Your board won't approve another failed attempt.

item3.title: We're Running Out of Time
item3.desc: New HIPAA requirements in 6 months. Legacy vendor EOL in 12 months.
item3.impact: If you don't migrate soon, you'll face penalties AND downtime.

problems.solution: I've heard this 100 times. Here's how we solve it.

process.title: The Zero-Downtime, 100% Compliant Migration Process
process.subtitle: A proven 4-phase approach that's worked 12 times without a single incident

phase1.title: Compliance Audit
activities: Review all HIPAA/FHIR controls against current system
phase1.outcome: Clear roadmap with zero compliance risk

phase2.title: AWS Architecture Design
activities: Create rollback procedures for every step

phase3.title: Migration Execution
phase3.outcome: Zero downtime, all systems running on AWS

phase4.title: Optimization & Validation
activities: Train your team on AWS operations

roi.title: Calculate Your Potential Savings
roi.subtitle: See what you could save with a properly executed healthcare cloud migration

proof.title: Real Results from Real Projects
proof.subtitle: Don't just take my word for it—here's the proof

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Addressing your concerns about healthcare cloud migration

q1.q: What if we have a data breach during migration?
q1.a: Zero-downtime strategy means your production system never goes offline. Data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256). We migrate in phases with rollback procedures at every step. In 12 migrations, we've never had a breach. Every migration includes a comprehensive security audit before, during, and after.

q2.q: How long will we be down?
q2.a: Zero downtime. Migrations happen during off-hours with parallel systems running. Users never see disruption. We use blue-green deployment strategies and can roll back instantly if needed. Your team continues working normally throughout the entire process.

q3.q: What if HIPAA requirements change mid-migration?
q3.a: Architecture is designed for compliance flexibility. We monitor regulatory changes continuously and adapt the plan proactively. Your system will meet current AND future requirements. We include buffer time and contingency plans for regulatory updates.

q4.q: We don't have budget for this.
q4.a: Average ROI is 285% in year 1. Most clients save enough to pay for the project within 8 months through infrastructure optimization alone. Use the ROI calculator above to see YOUR potential savings. Many organizations find the migration pays for itself through avoided audit penalties and reduced operational costs.

q5.q: How do I know you won't leave us stranded?
q5.a: Every project includes 90 days post-migration support and complete documentation. I train your team to operate the new system independently. You get runbooks, architecture diagrams, and access to me for questions. Several clients from 3+ years ago still reach out occasionally—I'm always available.
